## SavedObjectsBulkUpdateObject.namespace property

Optional namespace string to use when searching for this object. If this is defined, it will supersede the namespace ID that is in [SavedObjectsBulkUpdateOptions](./opensearch-dashboards-plugin-core-server.savedobjectsbulkupdateoptions.md)<!-- -->.

Note: the default namespace's string representation is `'default'`<!-- -->, and its ID representation is `undefined`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
namespace?: string;
```
